version_description:
You spoke and we listened!

- Logged in users on multi-passenger itineraries now have the ability to retrieve their own mobile boarding passes through our apps and mobile website.

International destinations can now be booked in the app! Grab your passport and don’t forget your phone!
We squashed some bugs this release to help you on your way.

Saved search during Check-in. When you search for your flight and it’s not yet time to check-in, we’re now saving that search criteria, so upon return you can tap and go.

Venture into Southwest Vacations – now easier than ever! Check it out in the

Saved search during Check-in. When you search for your flight and it’s not yet time to check-in, we’re now saving that search criteria, so upon return you can tap and go.

Venture into Southwest Vacations – now easier than ever! Check it out in the
We continue to make bug fixes and performance enhancements.
In this update we have released an iPad compatible app and an Inflight Entertainment Player!
We continue to make updates to improve your in-app experience.
Now you can manage your international trips in the app
We continue to make bug fixes and performance enhancements.
You can now manage your international trips in the app.
You can now manage your international trips in the app.

You can add your Rapid Rewards® Number, Known Traveler Number (KTN), and Redress number to your reservation both during and after booking a flight!

You can now also pay with PayPal®

You can add your Rapid Rewards® Number, Known Traveler Number (KTN), and Redress number to your reservation both during and after booking a flight!

Live Chat is here! Contact our Customer Representatives through Live Chat by scrolling down to Conta
Live Chat is here! Contact our Customer Representatives through Live Chat by scrolling down to Contact Us in the navigation drawer, and then tap on “Chat”.

The newly redesigned Southwest Mobile Boarding passes have rich color and bold font, which makes seeing your Gate and Boarding Position very clear. Find the details you need quickly: Flight Number, Confirmation Number, Boarding Time, Tier Status, and TSA

You asked, we heard! You can now look up and use your Travel Funds!
You asked, we heard! You can now look up and use your Travel Funds!
You asked, we heard! You can now get mobile boarding passes for ALL passengers on your reservation, that’s right – all passengers, all boarding passes, one place, in your app!
You asked, we heard! You can now get mobile boarding passes for ALL passengers on your reservation, that’s right – all passengers, all boarding passes, one place, in your app!
You asked, we heard! You can now get mobile boarding passes for ALL passengers on your reservation, that’s right – all passengers, all boarding passes, one place, in your app!

The beloved iPad gets some love with this release. You can now use your Southwest iPad App in Portrait mode, or continue using it in Landscape mode, or switch back and forth – either way you’re in control.
Your unused Southwest® Travel Funds show up automatically when you tap ‘View Funds’ within ‘My Account’.
Your unused Southwest® Travel Funds show up automatically when you tap ‘View Funds’ within ‘My Account’.
Share! Share! Share! Share flight status of an upcoming trip using iMessage, or flight status of any Southwest flight via the app or iMessage. And then there's our fun stickers!
You can now use Travel Funds, Southwest LUV Vouchers and Gift Cards when changing your flight in the app
You can now use Travel Funds, Southwest LUV Vouchers and Gift Cards when changing your flight in the app

We made improvements and fixed bugs for a smoother ride.
Happy New Year! We’ve done some housekeeping – a few tweaks here, squashed some bugs there – for a richer app experience.
